subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: It was about 12:30 a.m. when Matt Walbeck, Cameron Maybin’s manager at Class AA Erie, told him that the Detroit Tigers wanted him in the major leagues.
snippet: It was about 12:30 a.m. when Matt Walbeck, Cameron Maybin’s manager at Class AA Erie, told him that the Detroit Tigers wanted him in the major leagues.
